poker.object

Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • poker.object.SetCard
      • poker.object.Hand

  • public class Hand
extends SetCard
    Hand is a set of card. In addition, Hand has exactly 5 cards. With a valid hand, we can calculate the rank of Hand. The rank of hand can be used to define how strong of hand. The rank of hand can be from 1 to 10 correspond from High card to Royal flush

    • Method Detail

      • isHand

        public boolean isHand()
        Check a set of card is a valid hand or not
        Returns:
        TRUE if a set of card is a valid set card and it has exactly 5 cards otherwise return FALSE

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Get the rank of hand card
        Returns:
        the rank of hand card.
        1: High card
        2: One pair
        3: Two pair
        4: Three kind of card
        5: Flush
        6: Straight
        7: Full house
        8: Four kind of card
        9: Straight Flush
        10: Royal Flush
        -1: Error

      • isStraight

        public boolean isStraight()
        Check the hand is straight or not. straight is a hand where all of the cards are consecutive. There is no continuous quality to this poker hand a straight cannot wrap around meaning it is not a straight if you have a Queen, King, Ace, Two or Three. Standard poker rules state that in the case of more than one straight, the higher straight wins, In case of straight that tie, the pot is split.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the hand is straight otherwise return FALSE

      • isFlush

        public boolean isFlush()
        Check the hand is flush or not
        A flush is a hand where all of the cards are the same suit, if each card you have is all one suit, such as 3 of Clubs, 5 of Clubs, 6 of Clubs, 8 of Clubs and King of Clubs, then you have a Flush. Don't be tricked into thinking that all five cards are the same color. The high card determines the winner if two people have a flush
        Returns:
        TRUE if the hand is flush otherwise return FALSE

      • isFour

        public boolean isFour()
        Check the set of card has a four of card or not
        Returns:
        TRUE if the set of card has a four of card otherwise return FALSE
